name: Curve Network
description: What is the project about? Curve network is a Layer-1 network with lightning-fast, Secure & scalable blockchain economy. What makes your project unique? Curve Network built on top of Energyfi, Curve build with Delegated Proof of Stake (DPoS) consesus mechanism and EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) compatible blockchain. It will be a green and fast network focused on Interoperability, DeFi and Responsible Web3 project adoption as well as users security. History of your project? We are building blockchain over 3 month and finally we are launch on Pancakeswap. But, we are building bridge under BSC - Curve Network L1 chains. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are building ecosystem under our own blockchain like Launchpad, Staking, Farming, Decentralized Exchange (DEX) & Much more. What can your token be used for? Curve network Token. CURVE is the native utility token of Curve blockchain. CURVE will be used to pay transaction fees or any services directly related to the on-chain activity.
